divs: Sighting Detailswish i had a camera with video the UFO is back I'm in lansingburgh looking north west loos like a star but flashing different colors ! no i haven't smoked anything funny ,,, im in my apartment i also seen the same thing on the 13th its sorta round looking flashing blue green red and white lights zig sagging and up down movements last time it faded away im going to look at it again now ,,,, i will re post news if it changes
